content.query:
select  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.schema') AS [schema]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.LastModifiedDate') AS [LastModifiedDate]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.commitNumber') AS [commitNumber]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.commitUser') AS [commitUser]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.sequenceNumber') AS [sequenceNumber]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.entityName') AS [entityName]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.changeType') AS [changeType]
,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(Table2.VALUE,'"',''),'[',''),']','') AS  [changedFields]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.changeOrigin') AS [changeOrigin]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.transactionKey') AS [transactionKey]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.commitTimestamp') AS [commitTimestamp]
--,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.recordIds[0]') AS [recordIds]
--,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.recordIds[1]') AS [recordIds]
--,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.recordIds[2]') AS [recordIds]
--,JSON_QUERY(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.recordIds') AS [recordIds]
,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(Table1.VALUE,'"',''),'[',''),']','') AS  [recordIds]
,JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.event.replayId') AS [replayId]

from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://nithindatalakestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/salesforce/jsonfiles/cdc_stream_12_21_22__06.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = 'Received:'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
    CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(JSON_QUERY(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.recordIds'),',')  as Table1
    CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(JSON_QUERY(doc, '$.payload.ChangeEventHeader.changedFields'),',')  as Table2
